scene_1.natural_language_description: Walk to the kitchen and find the basket of clothes. Put the soap and clothes into the washing machine. Turn on the washing machine.

goals.g1: Find the basket of clothes, wash them in the washing machine.
goals.g2: Find the basket of clothes, put the clothes into the washing machine with some soap, and wash them.
goals.g3: Find the basket of clothes. First, hand wash these clothes, then put it in the washing machine for a thorough clean.
goals.g4: Find the basket of clothes. First, hand wash these clothes with soap, then put clothes and soap in the washing machine for a thorough clean.
goals.g5: Find the basket of clothes. First, hand wash these clothes with soap, then put the clothes into the washing machine for a thorough clean. I want to use some cleaning products to make my clothes cleaner, but I don't want to use the laundry detergent.

scene_1.natural_language_description: I go to bedroom and locate a lamp. This lamp can be turned on by touch, as it has capacitive sensing. So I do it.

goals.g1: Turn on the lights in the bathroom.
goals.g2: Turn on the lights in the bedroom. Then turn on the lights in the bathroom.
goals.g3: Make sure there is at least one light on in every room.
goals.g4: Turn on all the lights in the house. Except the lights in the home office.
goals.g5: Turn on the lights around bed.
goals.g6: Turn on the tv and turn off all the lights in the home office.

scene_1.natural_language_description: Walk to the office, sit down on chair, attach keyboard to the computer, attach mouse to the computer, switch the computer on, type the email on the keyboard.

goals.g1: Turn on the computer in home office.
goals.g2: Turn on the computer in home office. Sit on the chair in front of the computer. Touch the mouse and check my email.
goals.g3: Turn on the computer in home office. Sit on the chair in front of the computer. Touch the mouse and check my email. Then type a new email.
goals.g4: Turn on the computer in home office. Sit on the chair in front of the computer. Touch the mouse and check my email. Then type a new email. Finally, turn off my computer after sending the email.
goals.g5: Work on the computer in the home office.

scene_1.natural_language_description: Walk to kitchen. Open fridge. Put milk in fridge. Put turkey in fridge. Put eggs in fridge. Put fish in fridge. Put chicken in fridge.

goals.g1: Put milk, turkey, eggs, fish and chicken on the table.
goals.g2: Wash the fish at first. Then put milk, turkey, eggs, fish and chicken on the table.
goals.g3: Throw away everything originally in the freezer. Then put milk, turkey, eggs, fish and chicken in the freezer.
goals.g4: Cut the chicken into pieces, then put it in the freezer.
goals.g5: Wash the fish at first. Then cut the chicken into pieces. Throw all the items originally in the freezer. Finally, put milk, turkey, eggs, washed fish and cut chicken in the freezer.

scene_1.natural_language_description: its time for my favorite show and im going change with the help of remote control and watch

goals.g2: Turn on the TV with the remote control.
goals.g3: Sitting on the couch, then turn on the TV with the remote control.

scene_1.natural_language_description: Put dishes in the dishwasher and start the dishwasher.

goals.g1: wash the bowls and the plates with dishwasher
goals.g2: Put dish soap in the dishwasher. Wash the bowls and the plates with dishwasher
goals.g3: wash drinking glasses, bowls and the plates and forks with dishwasher
goals.g4: wash all the dishes on the table with dishwasher
goals.g5: wash those cookware on the table, kitchen counter and stove.

scene_1.natural_language_description: Make the bed so that I can rest at any time.

goals.g1: Find two pillows and put them on the bed
goals.g2: Store all the clothes on the bed to the closetdrawer. Then find the pillow and put it on the bed
goals.g3: Store all the clothes on the bed to the closetdrawer. Then find the pillow and put it on the bed. And prepare a cup of water on the nightstand

scene_1.natural_language_description: Walk into bedrrom and to the sofa. Sit on the sofa and touch cat.

goals.g1: Find my cat and touch it
goals.g2: Slice some chicken to feed my cat.
goals.g3: Prepare a bowl of water for my cat. Put the bowl on the table in home office. Then find my cat take it to the table.
goals.g4: Shower my cat in the bathtub.
goals.g5: Shower my cat in the bathtub. Use towel to dry my cat.
goals.g6: Shower my cat in the bathtub. Use towel to dry my cat. Clean the towel in the sink.
goals.g7: Shower my cat in the bathtub. Use towel to dry my cat. Clean the towel in the sink. Squeeze the towel to dry it.

scene_1.natural_language_description: I walk to my bedroom.  I locate my stereo and turn it on.  I put on my headphones and sit to listen.

goals.g2: Turn on the dvd player with remote control.
goals.g3: Play music on phone and listen to it with headset.
goals.g4: Play music on phone and listen to it with headset. Then turn off the phone.

scene_1.natural_language_description: go to kitchen, find water glass and grab it, find fridge and open grab water and pour into it, then drink.

goals.g1: Get a cup of water from the faucet in the dining room.
goals.g2: Get a cup of ice water from the freezer.
goals.g3: Get a cup of water and add some sliced kiwi inside.
goals.g4: Get a cup of water and heat it by microwave.
goals.g5: Use pot to boil some water, and fill the cup with boiled water.

scene_1.natural_language_description: I walk to the living room and pick up a book from the coffee table. I find my favorite chair.  I sit in the armchair and open the book.  I read.

goals.g1: Find the book and put it on the coffe table in home office.
goals.g2: Find the book and put it on the table in bedroom. Then turn on the light in the bedroom.
goals.g3: Find the book and put it on the coffe table in home office. Then open the window in the home office.
goals.g4: Find the book and put it on the coffe table in home office. Then prepare a cup of hot milk, put it on the table.
goals.g5: Find my spectacles and put it on the coffe table in home office. Then find the book and put it on the coffe table in home office. Then prepare a cup of hot milk, put it on the table.

goals.g2: Wash all the vegetables, then put them in a pot and boil them on the stove.
goals.g3: Wash all the vegetables, then put them in a pot and boil them on the stove. Then cool them in a bowl of water.
goals.g4: Wash all the vegetables, then put them in a pot and boil them on the stove. Then store them in the freezer.

scene_1.natural_language_description: Walk to the closet and grab the vacuum cleaner. Plug it in, turn it on, and vacuum the living room floor.

goals.g2: Vacuum the living room floor, then clean the vacuum cleaner after use.

goals.g1: Brew a cup of coffee using the coffee maker.
goals.g2: Brew a cup of coffee using the coffee maker, then add milk and sugar.
goals.g3: Clean the coffee maker after brewing coffee.

goals.g1: Open the windows in the bathroom.
goals.g2: Clean all the windows in the house.

goals.g3: Wash vegetables, cook rice, and grill chicken.

goals.g2: Iron a shirt and a pair of pants.
goals.g3: Iron all the clothes in the laundry basket.
goals.g4: Iron a shirt, fold it, and put it in the closet.
goals.g5: Iron all the clothes in the basket, fold them neatly, and place them in the closet.

goals.g3: Prepare scrambled eggs, toast, and juice.
goals.g4: Scramble eggs, toast bread, and brew coffee.
goals.g5: Prepare scrambled eggs, toast bread, pour juice, and set the table for breakfast.

goals.g2: Clean the bathroom sink and toilet.
goals.g3: Clean the bathroom sink, toilet, and floor.
goals.g4: Clean the bathroom and disinfect all surfaces.
